entry.title: I know you are but what am I? / あの子
entry.content:
I know you are but what am I? / あの子
Dec 2019 / 303 x 303 mm (500dpi)

Your face, your voice, your song, I cannot remember them.
But, I have always known you.

entry.title: Nightingale / 戦場に咲く花
entry.content:
Nightingale / 戦場に咲く花
Dec 2019 / 454 x 322 mm

May the world be at peace.

May all languages, principles, and religions be treated equally with respect.

May our hearts be filled with mercy and love, and do away with conflicts and strife.

May calm and tranquility come to our souls.

May my life become a small prayer, and travel across this star.

Print file
  • A3

entry.title: プロフィール
entry.content:
廣川政樹
テクニカルアーティスト

1981年、富山県生まれ。16歳からWebデザインとプログラミングを始める。2005年よりフリーランスとなり、2006年に MTV SO-ZO Competition「Webスクリーンセーバー部門」にて優秀賞受賞。現在 iPhone/Androidアプリの開発や CG制作を続けている。

Personal History

  • 2005～ フリーランスに転向 : Webデザイン・プログラミング/CG/インタラクティブムービーを手掛ける
  • 2005/04/24 渋谷「青い部屋」のイベント、サエキけんぞうのパリ・エレガンス出演（VJ）
  • 2005/06/04 代官山「ASB」にて BLACK RIBONS ライブ出演 (VJ)
  • 2005/06/10 インターネットTV番組「棘々と影」23:00-23:25 出演
  • 2005/07/06 渋谷「青い部屋」にて BLACK RIBONS ライブ出演 (VJ)
  • 2005/07/31 東高円寺「Club UFO」にて BLACK RIBONS ライブ出演 (VJ)
  • 2006/06 福岡 Gallery Celeste「My Little Space」展へCG出典
  • 2006/08 ニューヨーク PH Gallery「J-Passion Vol.1」展へCG・インタラクティブムービー出典
  • 2006/10 渋谷 Art Shot Bar ARAQ「POP展・グループ展」へCG・インタラクティブムービー出典
  • 2006/10/27 渋谷 青い部屋のイベント「MEME」に出演 (ACTOR)
  • 2006/11 MTV SO-ZO Competition「Webスクリーンセーバー部門」優秀賞受賞
  • 2006/11/05 渋谷「VUENOS」 にて Kehre. ライブ出演 (VJ)
  • 2008/03 株式会社ファッションウォーカーへシステムディレクターとして出向勤務
  • 2008/06/06 月刊 MdN 2008年7月号「Photoshop Making Studio」へ CG寄稿／解説文執筆
  • 2008/06/14 日本グラフィックデザイナー協会 JAGDA in OSAKA 2008: Another Japan オープニングムービー出典
  • 2008/12/06 月刊 MdN 2009年1月号「注目のクリエイターたちに学ぶ アート表現、プロの魅せ方・つくり方」へ CG寄稿／解説文執筆
  • 2009/06/25 月刊 MySpace From JP. 2009年8月号「on View From JP.」へ CG寄稿
  • 2009/07/16 iPhone + loftwork world traveler project「artist calendar部門」入選
  • 2009/08/11 銀座 GALLERY ART POINT／ギャラリー・アート・ポイント「Larotica II」展へ CG出典
  • 2009/08/25 月刊 MySpace From JP. 2009年10月号「GADGET FOR DIGITAL NATIVE」へ CG寄稿／解説文執筆
  • 2010/01/30 MdNムック「Photoshop三ツ星テクニック大全」へ CG／解説文寄稿
  • 2010/11/01 MdNムック「Photoshop×Illustratorで創り出す　コラージュ＆イラスト」へ CG／解説文寄稿
  • 2013/12/27 月刊 MacPeople（マックピープル） 2014年2月号「iPhoneデベロッパーがいま考えていること」へ記事寄稿
  • 2014/05/29 月刊 MacPeople（マックピープル） 2014年7月号「人気＆注目のデベロッパーに聞く！スマホアプリの最新トレンド！」にインタビュー記事掲載
  • 2016/01/22 技術評論社「自律神経を整えるスマホアプリ100選」に iPhoneアプリ2本掲載
  • 2019/04/05 宝島社「大人のおしゃれ手帖 2019年5月号」に iPhoneアプリ「リラックス・ヒーリング」掲載
  • 2019/06/28 株式会社リクルート「ホットペッパービューティー 2019年7月号」に iPhoneアプリ「リラックス・ヒーリング」掲載

Awards

  • Granted award
    MTV SO-ZO Competition supported by AMD 2006

entry.title: Profile
entry.content:
Masaki Hirokawa
Technical Artist

Born in Toyama Prefecture in 1981. Began Web design and programming at 16. Worked as a DTP operator at Kokuwa System inc. starting in 2000. Afterward, changed professions to programmer, and developed database management software for an insurance company.

In 2003, prompted by a Web game design project, became a Web designer. Contracted by Bascule Inc. to create a CSS template for the former Vodafone official site.

In 2006, received award for excellence in the Web Screensaver category of the MTV SO-ZO Competition.

Currently continuing freelance activities developing iPhone/Android apps and creating CG.

Personal History

  • 2005- Transitioned to freelance work in Web design, programming, CG, and interactive movies.
  • 2005/04/24 Appeared in Kenzo Saeki’s Paris Elegance at an event at Aoi Heya in Shibuya (VJ).
  • 2005/06/04 Appeared in BLACK RIBONS live performance at ASB in Daikanyama (VJ).
  • 2005/06/10 Appeared in the Internet TV program “Togetoge to Kage”, 23:00-23:25.
  • 2005/07/06 Appeared in BLACK RIBONS live performance at Aoi Heya in Shibuya (VJ).
  • 2005/07/31 Appeared in BLACK RIBONS live performance at Club UFO in Higashi-Koenji (VJ).
  • 2006/06 Displayed CG at the My Little Space exhibition at Gallery Celeste in Fukuoka.
  • 2006/08 Displayed CG and interactive movies at the J-Passion Vol.1 exhibition at the PH Gallery in New York.
  • 2006/10 Displayed CG and interactive movies at the POP Exhibition and Group Exhibition at Art Shot Bar ARAQ in Shibuya.
  • 2006/10/27 Appeared in the MEME event at Aoi Heya in Shibuya (Actor).
  • 2006/11 Received MTV SO-ZO Competition award for excellence in the Web Screensaver category.
  • 2006/11/05 Appeared in Kehre. live performance at VUENOS in Shibuya (VJ).
  • 2008/03 Seconded to Fashionwalker, Inc. as System Director.
  • 2008/06/06 Contributed CG and wrote commentary for “Photoshop Making Studio” in the July 2008 issue of the monthly magazine MdN.
  • 2008/06/14 Displayed Another Japan opening movie at Japan Graphic Designers Association’s JAGDA in OSAKA 2008.
  • 2008/12/06 Contributed CG and wrote commentary for “Lessons in Artistic Expression and Professional Methods for Publicizing and Creating Learned from Featured Creators” in the January 2009 issue of MdN.
  • 2009/06/25 Contributed CG to “on View From JP.” in the August 2009 issue of the monthly magazine MySpace From JP.
  • 2009/07/16 Selected for the iPhone + loftwork World Traveler Project in the Artist Calendar category.
  • 2009/08/11 Displayed CG at the Larotica II exhibition at GALLERY ART POINT in Ginza.
  • 2009/08/25 Contributed CG and wrote commentary for “GADGET FOR DIGITAL NATIVE” in the October 2009 issue of MySpace From JP.
  • 2010/01/30 Contributed CG and commentary to the MdN mook ”Photoshop Mitsuboshi Technique Encyclopedia”.
  • 2010/11/01 Contributed CG and commentary to the MdN Mook ”Collages and Illustrations created with Photoshop and Illustrator”.
  • 2013/12/27 Contributed to the article “Current Thoughts of iPhone Developers” in the February 2014 issue of the monthly magazine MacPeople.
  • 2014/05/29 Contributed to the article “Developers of Popular & Noteworthy” in the July 2014 issue of the monthly magazine MacPeople.
  • 2016/01/22 Two iPhone apps have been added to ”100 Smartphone Apps to Adjust Your Autonomic Nerves”, by Gijutsu-Hyohron Co., Ltd.
  • 2019/04/05 The iPhone app ”Relaxing Healing” was featured in the May 2019 issue of ”Otona no Oshare Techo” (Fashion Notebook for Women), published by Takarajimasha, Inc.
  • 2019/06/28 The iPhone app ”Relaxing Healing” was featured in the July 2019 issue of ”HOT PEPPER Beauty”, published by Recruit Holdings Co., Ltd.

Awards

  • Granted award
    MTV SO-ZO Competition supported by AMD 2006
